name: Quantic Protocol
description: What is the project about? Quantic Protocol is BEP-20 utility token built on top of the Binance Smart Chain, operating on the Layer 1 of the blockchain network. Quantic Protocol is committed to providing users with a seamless and secure experience in the world of decentralized finance (DeFi). What is the use of Quantic's Staking platform? Staking on Quantic allows users to earn rewards on their Quantic tokens while holding them. By staking, users are helping to secure the network and validate transactions. In return, they receive a share of the rewards generated by the network. Additionally, staking can provide liquidity to the market and help stabilize the price of the Quantic token.
